comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Not a gun at all, but a Gaertner Scientific G-4 Gun Camera (G-4 Camera Gun) used for aerial gunnery training.  The camera would start filming as the pilot pressed the "trigger" and  record if the pilot truly had his opponent in his sights.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: Thanks for that note and the tags!
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
